name: Caseconverter
tagline: This project is an idea I had after developping the node webkit lowerToUpper
body:
Case Converter
=========


A chrome extension allowing you to convert text to lowercase or uppercase on the fly.

Just type your text and you'll see it converted in the two other boxes.

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/benavern/caseconverter/master/Capture.PNG "Screeshot")
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
